Installing / renewing Flexnet Cadverter License on pggpdb01 for Frank Sessler

** Contact Frank Sessler /DE/TA.EU and schedule the installation. Be sure to work with Frank while doing this. Also make sure you can use Same Time Meeting to share screen so Frank can check work as it progresses if required. Confirm each step with Frank use Same Time Chat to work step by step with Frank.

  • Frank will email you the new license as an attachment. Save the attachment to a local file on your PC
  • Use FileZilla to transfer file from local pc to pggpdb01. Transfer to your home directory . !!! NOTE MAKE SURE TRANSFER TYPE IS SET TO ASCII !!!! Thsi removes all special characters like ^M from file. Newer versions of FileZilla do automatic sensing and transfer as required.
  • You will need to coment out a line in /etc/inittab so make a copy of it now where yyyymmdd is current date 
     cd /etc 
     sudo cp -p inittab inittab-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H:%M:%S)
  • Edit the the inittan file 
    sudo vi initab
  • Comment out the following line <and save the file. Note in the inittab a ”:” is the comment character of dhoice, but a ”#” will also work. 
    flexlmtheorem:2:respawn:/opt/FLEXnet/cadverter/daemon_theorem start >/dev/null 2>&1
  • Now tell the init command to re-examine the /etc/inittab file Note in AIX the telint and init commands are identical in purpose. See https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/ssw_aix_61/com.ibm.aix.cmds5/telinit.htm 
     telinit q
  • Change to the cadverter directory 
    cd /opt/FLEXnet/cadverter
  • Save the current license as backup where yyyymmdd is current date 
    sudo cp -p license.lic license.lic-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H:%M:%S)
  • Copy the new licene 
    sudo cp -p {new license location} ./license.lic
  • Copy the license.lic file to theorem.lic.
     sudo cp -p license.lic theorem.lic
  • Owner & group of theorem.lic should be root:system If they are not correct fix them now
  • Change the permissions on the therom.lic file 
    sudo chmod 666 theorem.lic
  • Invoke the new license 
    sudo ./lmutil lmreread -c ./license.lic
  • Frank will check the file and run tests to insure the new license is activated.

Extra commands that Frank may ask you to do if there are isues. 

  •  sudo ./daemon_theorem start
  • Once everything is working correctoy go back and undo the comment in the inittab file

* Edit the the inittan file 

sudo vi initab
  • Uncomment out the following line (you commented this out earlier) and save the file. 
    flexlmtheorem:2:respawn:/opt/FLEXnet/cadverter/daemon_theorem start >/dev/null 2>&1
  • Now tell the init command to re-examine the /etc/inittab file Note in AIX the telint and init commands are identical in purpose. See https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/ssw_aix_61/com.ibm.aix.cmds5/telinit.htm 
     telinit q
